name: kathie lavery
text:
I had a great experience. I received a card that gave me a FREE MEDIUM PIZZA with a TOPPING for my birthday-what a nice gesture. I also ordered
a pepperoni roll and it was delicious. My pizza was not grease and the staff ‚Ä¶More

name: Danielle Watters
text: Pepperoni and cheese stuffed bread was not baked all the way, it was doughy!!!

name: Katrina Beadnell
text: The person who took my order was very rude and wouldn't let me talk and kept cutting me off when I was trying to ask what the specials were. Then when I was trying to give her my order she had a very bad attitude and it was not appropriate towards a customer.

name: Bob Kittoe
text: Still waiting for a call back..  Pizza dry and several pieces had no sausage.  Ordered extra sauce and extra sausage.  Not worth it.

name: Ivy Holston
text: Its pizza with favored crusted.. you really can't go wrong.

name: Rebecca Howard
text: The pizza is the best. Love the flavors on the crust.

name: twiztid kitten
text: This place is fantastic! The prices are okay & the customer service is great, don't know the employees/delivery drivers by name but they're very friendly every time I order. ‚Ä¶More

name: Ricardo Leos
text: Was in town for a wedding, I got food to go. To bad the one in Elyria closed. The closest one to me is in Westlake.

name: Matt Ward
text: I've had really good pizzas from here and a few really bad ones. Anything that is cooked been be messed up so I understand. ‚Ä¶More

name: Caitlin Smith
text: I enjoy thier pizza and subs. I especially like the sausage. And garlic herb crust. I wish the pizza rewards were better. Honestly one of my favorite pizza places. Just wish they had better wings. And add Jojos.

name: Mary Wade
text: Way overpriced a large pepperoni pizza extra cheese with delivery over $17.00 I think never again for some of the nastiest pizza I've had I think this is ridiculous

name: Angela Ciecerko
text: The guys at hungry Howie alliance are amazing. Nicest people ever!!

name: Justin M
text: Pizza was good service was okay

name: Tim Barnard
text: Very good BBQ boneless wings!! Calzone was made to order and was very good. Good customer service. 1 year later, still good deals and service is pretty good

name: dillon
text: Pizza was alright could of been better tho

name: Pam Ensor
text: My family is up visiting family and decided to get some pizza. It was delivered in a timely manner and was still hot ( like it just came out of the oven).  The price was very reasonable. Will recommend to family and friends.

name: Rich Pollock
text: Great place, excellent employees! The best  pizza!

name: ATown Rebel
text: Prices are alright and the food isn't bad either, however, the way my only complaint was handled by the manager could've been handled without the name calling. This is definitely not a customer first kind of place

name: Rob Langevoort
text: The prices are great but their pizza is mediocre at best. Although I find myself going back again and again ... so it must be good pizza!

name: Aimie Thomas
text: We ordered online last Tuesday 4/3 at 6:08pm. App said 30-45 minutes, fine. I checked the app @ 6:50pm, said my order was out for delivery. At 7:14pm I received a phone call from the driver stating he was on the other side of town, by ‚Ä¶More

name: Louise Potts
text: Great pizza!

name: Russ Friend
text: We used to go to HH all the time for take-out.  However, they repeatedly screwed up our order.  This last time, I ordered my USUAL (what i order every blasted time), large, thin crust, with sausage and pineapple, and ordered a second for my ‚Ä¶More

name: Dustin Teis
text: Free pizzas to kids with good grades, what a great idea.

name: Caleb Monk
text: Good place, most workers are nice and always put the customer first

name: Cindy LaFord
text: Fast, friendly service with good deals for any budget.

name: Tom Hickman
text: I've always liked this location. Manager seems like a decent guy, food gets made quick and taste as good as any other hungry howies.

name: Brittani Sinkovich
text: Ordered online,  said 25 mins,  went to the store 30 mins later,  and still had to wait another 15 mins.  Only one person working,  and watched 2 people walk out.
